nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_434_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: When he received the admission notice from the university, he knew it was time he struck out on his own.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_435_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I had to keep the video camera readily accessible in case I saw something that needed to be filmed.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_436_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Every time she tried to argue with her identical twin Katie, she would end up crying her eyes out.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_437_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Serious violence has sprung from the conflict over insignificant, irritating differences.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_438_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: There are many people who believe sincerely that you can train children for life without resorting to punishment.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_439_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Alan signed a dorm contract with his roommate to head off possible conflicts.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_440_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He was required to fill in a form before the job interview.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_441_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Her major concern is how she will make sure the people on the teams get along with one another.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_442_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Against all the odds, it has worked, and this is a measure of just how strong they both were as individuals when they came to the marriage ten years ago.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_443_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: What I'd like to do is to help them to see that they don't need to give up on the computer, that they can actually be the master of it.
